content:
Scenario: Adult children caring for aging parents receive support
    Given Sarah navigates complex dynamics of caring for her mother
    And role reversal creates emotional challenges
    When Sarah provides care for Helen
    Then the family_elohim should provide guidance on healthy boundaries
    And Sarah should receive recognition for care labor
    And emotional complexity should be acknowledged
    And Sarah should be connected to caregiver support resources
    And Helen's dignity should be preserved through care relationship changes
    And the protocol should support both caregiver and care recipient
    And family care should be sustainable and healthy for all
